Package com.hfych2.brickdestroy.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.hfych2.brickdestroy.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
This class is extracted from GameBoard of the original code and has been modified along with having additions.
This class is the controller class for the model GameBoard and the view GameView.
It defines the action on keyboard input during the game play.
It reads and writes to highScoresList.txt.
It sorts the highScoreList.txt contents and writes to sortedHighScoresList.txt
Author:
Carolyn

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    GameController​(GameBoard gameBoard, GameView gameView)
    Class constructor.
    Calls the GameView.updateView(GameBoard) and passes in the gameBoard model
    Calls the DebugConsole.updateView(GameView) and passes in the gameView view
    gameTimer and user is initialised here.
    gameTimer calls the gameCycle() using lambda expression.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void gameCycle()
    Keeps track of model states and updates view when necessary.
    Triggers the "Save Score Pop Up" which is a JOptionPane when a level is completed.
    If user chooses to save the score, scoreSaving() is invoked.
    void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent keyEvent)
    Defines the action for each different KeyEvent detected.
    Moves player left on 'A' key pressed.
    Moves player right on 'D' key pressed.
    Displays PauseMenu on 'ESC' key pressed.
    Starts/Stops gameTimer and GameBoard.getScoreTimer() on 'SPACEBAR' key pressed.
    Displays DebugConsole GameBoard.getDebugConsole()on 'ALT', 'SHIFT', 'F1' key pressed.
    void keyReleased​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent keyEvent)
    Stops the player from moving on key released.
    void keyTyped​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent keyEvent)  
    void mouseClicked​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Defines the action when one of the PauseMenu options are selected.
    void mouseDragged​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)  
    void mouseEntered​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)  
    void mouseExited​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)  
    void mouseMoved​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
    Change the cursor when PauseMenu is shown and it is in the outline area of the PauseMenu options.
    void mousePressed​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)  
    void mouseReleased​(java.awt.event.MouseEvent mouseEvent)  
    void onLostFocus()
    Defines the action when focus is lost.
    private void scoreConditions()
    Specifies the condition for the scores to be saved into highScoresList.txt
    Shows a "Score Saved Successfully" titled JOptionPane if condition is fulfilled.
    Shows a "Unable to Save Score" titled JOptionPane if condition is not fulfilled.
    private void scoreSaving()
    Saves the score to file if scoreConditions() are met.
    Reads and writes to highScoresList.txt
    Sorts all the scores saved in highScoresList.txt and writes to sortedHighScoresList.txt ScoreSorting.sortScore
    Prompts user to input their name to save to file using JOptionPane titled "Save Score".
    Informs user on their score of the current completed level using JOptionPane titled "Score Pop Up Message".
    Displays the all time best score using JOptionPane titled "Best Score Pop Up".
    Uses ArrayList to store information before writing to file.
    User.getUserName() User.getScore() User.getCurrentLevel()
    Uses Arraylist to find the all time best score.
    Reads file contents into ArrayLists.
    Writes ArrayList into sortedHighScoresList.txt ScoreSorting.toString()

  • Method Details

    • gameCycle

      private void gameCycle()
      Keeps track of model states and updates view when necessary.
      Triggers the "Save Score Pop Up" which is a JOptionPane when a level is completed.
      If user chooses to save the score, scoreSaving() is invoked.
      See Also:
      JOptionPane.showConfirmDialog(Component, Object, String, int)

    • scoreSaving

      private void scoreSaving()
      Saves the score to file if scoreConditions() are met.
      Reads and writes to highScoresList.txt
      Sorts all the scores saved in highScoresList.txt and writes to sortedHighScoresList.txt ScoreSorting.sortScore
      Prompts user to input their name to save to file using JOptionPane titled "Save Score".
      Informs user on their score of the current completed level using JOptionPane titled "Score Pop Up Message".
      Displays the all time best score using JOptionPane titled "Best Score Pop Up".
      Uses ArrayList to store information before writing to file.
      User.getUserName() User.getScore() User.getCurrentLevel()
      Uses Arraylist to find the all time best score.
      Reads file contents into ArrayLists.
      Writes ArrayList into sortedHighScoresList.txt ScoreSorting.toString()
      See Also:
      FileWriter, Writer, Scanner, Collections.min(Collection), User, ScoreSorting

    • scoreConditions

      private void scoreConditions()
      Specifies the condition for the scores to be saved into highScoresList.txt
      Shows a "Score Saved Successfully" titled JOptionPane if condition is fulfilled.
      Shows a "Unable to Save Score" titled JOptionPane if condition is not fulfilled.
      See Also:
      JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(Component, Object, String, int)

    • onLostFocus

      public void onLostFocus()
      Defines the action when focus is lost. Stops both gameTimer and GameBoard.getScoreTimer() Sets message to inform user of focus lost. Calls the Component.repaint()method.

    • keyPressed

      public void keyPressed​(java.awt.event.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Defines the action for each different KeyEvent detected.
      Moves player left on 'A' key pressed.
      Moves player right on 'D' key pressed.
      Displays PauseMenu on 'ESC' key pressed.
      Starts/Stops gameTimer and GameBoard.getScoreTimer() on 'SPACEBAR' key pressed.
      Displays DebugConsole GameBoard.getDebugConsole()on 'ALT', 'SHIFT', 'F1' key pressed.
      Specified by:
      keyPressed in interface java.awt.event.KeyListener
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - the KeyEvent detected during game play.
      See Also:
      Player.moveLeft(), Player.moveRight(), Timer.stop(), Timer.start()
